Sentencas: Chromium (Cr) vapor species from chromia-forming alloy interconnects are known to cause cathode performance degradation in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: To understand the impact of Cr-poisoning on cathode performance, it is important to determine its effects on different cathode polarization losses.
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, anode-supported SOFCs, with a (La,Sr)MnO3 (LSM) +
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) cathode active layer and a LSM cathode current collector layer were fabricated.
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, cells were electrochemically tested in direct contact with Crofer22H meshes, under different cathode atmospheres (dry air or humidified air) and current conditions (open-circuit or galvanostatic).
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Significant performance degradation was observed when cell was tested under galvanostatic condition (0.5 A/cm(2)), which was not the case under open-circuit condition.
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Humidity was found to accelerate the performance degradation.
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: By curve-fitting the experimentally measured current-voltage traces to a polarization model, the effects of Cr-poisoning on different cathodic polarization losses were estimated.
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It is found that, under normal operating conditions, increase of activation polarization dominates the cathode performance degradation.
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Microstructures of the cathodes were characterized and Cr-containing deposits were identified.
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Higher concentrations of Cr-containing deposits were found at the cathode/electrolyte interface and the amounts directly correlated with the cell performance degradations.
Titulo: Chromium Poisoning Effects on Performance of (La,Sr) MnO3-Based Cathode in Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
